url_api = "https://aiu-portal.pockethost.io/api/collections/network_situation/records?sort=-date&perPage=1&skipTotal=1"
network_latest = await d3.json(url_api);
dd = network_latest.items[0];
formatTime = d3.utcFormat("%d %B %Y");
latest_date = formatTime(d3.isoParse(dd.date))

ld = d3.select("#y2d_day_text").text("01 Jan - " + latest_date);
tr = d3.select("#y2d_traffic").text(d3.format(",")(dd.y2d_flights_total));
av = d3.select("#avg_y2d_traffic").text(d3.format(",")(Math.round(dd.y2d_flights_daily_average)));
y9 = d3.select("#dif_y2d_2019").text(d3.format("+.0%")(dd.y2d_diff_2019_year_percentage));
yp = d3.select("#dif_y2d_prev_year").text(d3.format("+.0%")(dd.y2d_diff_previous_year_percentage));

What’s new?

Released: EUROCONTROL Data App v4

Version 4 of the EUROCONTROL Data app is now released giving you access to data for the top 40 airports in Europe, and much more!

iOS app Android app

EUROCONTROL Flash Briefing on Summer 2025 preparations

Traffic across the European network is up by 5% so far this year compared to the same period in 2024, with overall ATFM delays also up 5% compared to 2024. These trends are expected to continue into the summer, where we expect to see growth of 5% spread asymmetrically across the network.

Read more

FLY AI Forum

The third edition of the FLY AI Forum was held on 22-23 April 2025, gathering key stakeholders to explore the transformative impact of AI in the aviation sector. Watch the recordings from the event now!

See more

PRC Airport Operations Centres (APOC) Performance Study published!

The APOC concept is a flagship project of the Transformation Support Strategy (TSS) of the PRC. The study outlines the APOC concept, lists performance indicators, summarizes benefits and recommendations, and presents a European inventory of APOC implementations.

See more

Data Snapshot #51 on the Q1 2025 traffic growth

Traffic continues to grow in 2025, but there is a clear and continuing divide between southern and central/northern Europe.

See more

About the Aviation Intelligence Portal

In support of the independent work of the Performance Review Commission (PRC) this portal aims to:

  • ensure that all stakeholders in all EUROCONTROL States have high quality information on ANS performance available in a transparent, accurate, complete and unbiased manner;
  • stimulate an informed dialogue between all stakeholders for the benefit of the entire aviation network; and,
  • further develop the ANS performance analysis framework and the understanding of key ANS performance issues.

Feedback or questions? Please contact us

Get informed about our newsletters, publications, and data updates!
